page.title: 06Park Farm
page.content: Park Farm in Alvington is owned by Mr.A.Wintour.He has {two acres of {potatoes}and {thirty three milking {cows.}There are twelve spaces in the milking parlour with only {six {milking machines.}He grows all sorts of vegetables: beans,peas,sprouts,potatoes,cabbages, swedes,carrots,cauliflowers,and spring onions.He has got two tractors{and a {lot of machinery}such as a seed sower,harvester,muck spreader and a potato sorter.He has hens that give two hundred eggs a day.These eggs are{ {sorted into their sizes.}He has fifteen calves which will replace the milking cows.Mr.Wintour's{son does all {the repairs}on the farm in his workshop.
